overview: An innovative film about women. Love and romantic illusions that blends both soft and hardcore scenes, Angel stars real life couple Angel (Alex Mackay) and Krista (Zoey Stone) in a bittersweet lesbian love story. Angel is a woman of few words, and when Krista suffers a devastating loss Angel quickly falls short of her grieving lover's expectations. Enter Daisha (Nica Noelle), a mysterious woman with a desire to manipulate the vulnerable Angel. Manuel Ferrera costars as Daisha's smooth-talking boyfriend in Nica Noelle's first ever boy/girl scene.
title: Angel
